name: Into Oblivion (itch)
description:
You wake up in a black-and-white world, remembering nothing of your past. The only "people" there are humanoid creatures who call themselves "guides". With their help, you realize that if you don't find your memories, you will be forced to stay in that world forever.

Into Oblivion is a visual novel with six endings, ten CC music tracks, and original character artwork. It was created in approximately one month, using the Ren'Py visual novel engine. The protagonist is nameable and has no determined gender.
